Articles.Content: I'm buying KSP for my 13 year old nephew James for christmas and I will be handing him a CD of the KSP 32bit installer. What I'm looking for is artwork for the CD cover. I can do it myself but I wanted to know if there was: any official artwork, a thread like this that I'm missing, or possibly if any of you have artwork you use and would like to share. Thanks.

I found this on the Facebookpage of KSP:

It's not an official picture, but I hope I can help you.

Gero

PS: Sorry for my bad English
